short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Multiple Chatbots: Ask multiple AI Assistants simultaneously!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Chat with Multiple AI Assistants simultaneously!

This is a tiny tool that will open multiple AI GPTs with the same prompt.

You can open the popup using a shortcut, the default one is Alt+Q. You can change it in settings.

Chatbots tabs will be grouped together, so it's easier to close them after you finished.

No API required.

You can create and use predefined prompts.

AI Chatbots Available:
ChatGPT	Gemini	Claude	Bing	Perplexity
